Class Raytracer.Tweaker

  • java.lang.Object
    • Raytracer.Tweaker
  • Enclosing class:
    Raytracer

    public class Raytracer.Tweaker
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages the "Tweaker" window and all the GUI controls that are drawn onto it.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private PApplet applet  
      private g4p_controls.GButton loadButton  
      private java.util.ArrayList<Raytracer.ParameterControl> parameters  
      private g4p_controls.GButton saveButton  
      private g4p_controls.GWindow tweakerWindow  
      private g4p_controls.GTimer updateTimer
      This timer (not drawn on the GUI) is used to slightly delay re-rendering the scene, to minimize jumpyness.

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public void draw​()

      • update

        public void update​()
        Triggers the update timer. The scene will be re-rendered only if the GUI controls are not changed again in the next 100ms.

      • addParameter

        public void addParameter​(Raytracer.ParameterControl parameter)
        Add a ParameterControl to the master list. Must be called before draw().

      • destroy

        public void destroy​()
        Force closes the window to prepare for deletion.
